lunr-js

A Polymer filter using lunr.js for a Array of Objects with common properties.

To use <lunr-js data="[[data]]" search="{{search}}" output="{{output}}" > </lunr-js> more “` <lunr-js data=”[[data]]“ search=”{{search}}“ output=”{{output}}“ fields=”[‘name’,'tags’]“ limit=30 minScore=.5

”` Needed

data : An Array of Objects with common properties.

search : Search term.

output : The Searched Array.

Options

fields : Fields to search

limit: Limit results

minScore: From 0 to 1

log: if you are seeing what’s happening
